TopicTitle: A couple of Cinematic Helper mods

Articles.Content:
Is there a mod that I can use to script multiple kerbals and vehicles, then have it execute where everything is moving so I can use something like Kerbcam to record a scene?

Also, is there a camera mod that stays in one place, then tracks an object? I may very well be derping with Kerbcam here >.>

I don't think that will say, stay on the ground and keep the rocket centered in the frame as it tracks it lifting off and disappearing from sight.

I'd like to shoot that scene, and then splice the footage into other shots as part of lift off sequence.

So, did I overlook something in Kerbcam or Hullcam VDS, as I'm not seeing this kinda of camera functionality in either of those (Kerbcam had an awesome initial key frame..... until the camera lifted off too).
